messages.title: Hiltinbury Road: Kyrle calls for action
messages.content: The Liberal Democrat Focus Team are continuing to work to improve Hiltinbury Road. Back in June, local councillors agreed a Lib Dem motion about the County Council coming to check Hiltinbury Road for the possibility of a 20 mph speed limit. Local Campaigner Martin Kyrle wants action to slow down traffic on Hiltinbury Road.

messages.title: Pothole Action
messages.content: There’s been a big pothole problem following the snow and the team have been reporting the worst ones and getting a response. Hiltinbury Road has been a particular problem.

messages.title: Rose Bowl
messages.content: Exciting plans to make the Rose Bowl one of the world's best cricket venues are still progressing.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Proposing a 20 mph speed limit, fixing potholes, making the Pine Road and Lakewood Road junctions safer, and other traffic safety improvements.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Martin Tod or the Conservatives can win here.

issues.environment: Martin Tod discusses conservation work with Martin Reeves of the Grasslands Trust.

housing.content: Exciting plans to make the Rose Bowl one of the world's best cricket venues are still progressing.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The Lib Dem team are there to help you. Tell us your views on the local issues or problems you need help with.
